amendment.description: Amendment sought to end the war in Afghanistan by limiting funding to the safe and orderly withdrawal of U.S. troops and military contractors from Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-485 to end the war in Afghanistan by limiting funding to the safe and orderly withdrawal of U.S. troops and military contractors from Afghanistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 303 (Roll no. 264).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 303 (Roll no. 264).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
